local_intent: Execute a short leftward push of the red T block (0.05 m at 180°) after alignment and yaw set to 180°.
assumptions: Target outline remains visible; use its visibility as a lightweight post-push check.
Block pose is roughly aligned after ApproachAndAlign; single short push suffices for this micro-step.
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT transfer phase: DetectObject → ApproachAndAlign(block_T, 0.005, 1200) → SetTCPYaw(180) → Push(block_T, 0.05, 180, 800) → verify via IsObjectVisible(target_T).
